verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] n’t decided whether to extend allied nations relief from U.S. steel and aluminum tariffs , even though temporary exemptions are set to expire in less than 24 hours .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [V: decided] [ARG1: whether to extend allied nations relief from U.S. steel and aluminum tariffs] , [ARGM-ADV: even though temporary exemptions are set to expire in less than 24 hours] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has n’t decided whether to [V: extend] [ARG1: allied nations relief] [ARG2: from U.S. steel and aluminum tariffs] , even though temporary exemptions are set to expire in less than 24 hours .
President Donald Trump has n’t decided whether to extend allied nations relief from U.S. steel and aluminum tariffs , even though temporary exemptions [V: are] set to expire in less than 24 hours .

President Donald Trump has n’t decided whether to extend allied nations relief from U.S. steel and aluminum tariffs , even though [ARG1: temporary exemptions] are [V: set] [ARG2: to expire in less than 24 hours] .

President Donald Trump has n’t decided whether to extend allied nations relief from U.S. steel and aluminum tariffs , even though [ARG1: temporary exemptions] are set to [V: expire] [ARGM-TMP: in less than 24 hours] .
